text: Agostino Giuseppe Delfino (17 June 1935 - 18 October 2020) was an Italian-born Central African Republic Roman Catholic bishop. Delfino was born in Arenzano, Italy. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1959. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Berbérati, Central African Republic from 1991 to 2010. Delfino died on 18 October 2020 in Savona, Italy at the age of 85.Diocese of Berbérati ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Central African Republic people
title: Agostino Giuseppe Delfino
